query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_clientes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN updatedAt > createdAt THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as clientes_atualizados,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(updatedAt) = '2025-11-19' AND DATE(createdAt) = '2025-10-21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as originais_atualizados_no_run,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN DATE(updatedAt) = '2025-11-19' THEN qualidadeScore ELSE NULL END), 2) as score_medio_atualizados
FROM clientes;
